title: Mexican Hot Chocolate (Taza de Chocolat
directions: Chop the chocolate into small pieces or grate it. Set aside.
Heat 2 cups of milk or water in a saucepan over medium heat until it almost boils.
Turn off the heat and add a pinch of salt to the milk or water.
Add the chocolate (chopped or grated) slowly while stirring until it is completely dissolved.
Once the chocolate is completely dissolved, the mixture to slowly warm over low heat.
Foam mixture on them, during the warming-up, with a whisk or a 'Molinillo'.
ingredients: 77 gr Taza Chocolate Mexicano discs each variant
2 cups of milk, soy milk, almond milk, or water
